column3: I wonder if this solves all the problems, there was also some zmq.h / libevent.h problem at least in the other PR.

They zeromq and libevent errors could be related to the vcpkg dependencies. I had to reinstall my vcpkg packages after updating Visual Studio. The error I got was ~~libraries being built with an older version of the runtime even though the latest version is still the same at `v.1.4.2`~~ `the object or library file was created with an older compiler than other objects; rebuild old objects and libra
Qt updated needed so will submit a new PR with more appropriate topic.
